name: chetball
description: boilerplate for web applications using typescript and webpack

scripts.build: rm -rf www && webpack -p && npm run copy-manifest
scripts.deploy: git add -f www && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix www master`:gh-pages --force && git rm -r www && git commit -m 'cleanup deploy'
scripts.clean: rm -rf www && rm -rf plugins && rm -rf platforms
scripts.build-ios: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run prepare-ios && npm run open-ios && node hooks/plist-fix.js
scripts.prepare-android: cordova prepare && cordova-icon && npm run fix-icons && npm run fix-gradle
scripts.fix-gradle:
sed -i'' -e $'s/android {/android {\
    flavorDimensions "default"\
    dexOptions {\
        jumboMode = true\
    }\
/g' platforms/android/build.gradle
scripts.build-android: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run prepare-android && npm run open-android
